body_html:
Actually, I am pretty sure this is correct grammar. already is indeed an adverb so you can use it to modify the verb in a simple sentence.

I already ate.

But in the present or past perfect it is commonly used next to the main verb instead of hte hlper verb had.

The plane had already landed.
body_text:
Actually, I am pretty sure this is correct grammar. already is indeed an adverb so you can use it to modify the verb in a simple sentence.
I already ate.

But in the present or past perfect it is commonly used next to the main verb instead of hte hlper verb had.
The plane had already landed.
body:
Actually, I am pretty sure this is correct grammar. already is indeed an adverb so you can use it to modify the verb in a simple sentence.
```
I already ate.
```
But in the present or past perfect it is commonly used next to the main verb instead of hte hlper verb had.
```
The plane had already landed.
```
